stripped_text: When you install this program and whenever it fully breaks a code gate, place 1 power counter on this program. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Interface -> X credits, hosted power counter: Break X barrier subroutines. 1 credit: +2 strength.
text: When you install this program and whenever it fully breaks a code gate, place 1 power counter on this program. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Interface → X[credit], hosted power counter: Break X barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +2 strength.
title: Lobisomem
